existing_features.title: Resolve the build failure by ensuring all imported React/TypeScript modules compile successfully, with primary focus on empty placeholder component files that currently contain no code.

Add a minimal developer-facing troubleshooting note to help identify similar future build errors (e.g., empty TSX modules, missing exports), and specify the exact command(s) to run to reproduce the error locally.
